customrecordcustomfield.help: Select whether the bank account is the vendor's/employee's/ customer's primary or secondary bank account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Type

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the payment file format that will be used to process payments to this vendor/employee/customer or payments from this customer.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment File Format

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account number.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Account Number

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account name.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Account Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the code used to identify the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank within the banking industry.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Number

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the name of the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the code that identifies the bank branch where the vendor's/employee's/customer's account is maintained.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Branch Number

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the name of the bank branch where the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account is maintained.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Branch Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account type. You can choose from Ordinary or Checking account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Type

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter text that will be displayed on the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank statement. It is common practice to put your customer code (assigned to you by the vendor) into this field.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Account Payment Description

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter text that will be displayed on the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank statement. It is common practice to put your customer code (assigned to you by the vendor) into this field.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Reference

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the International Bank Account Number of the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: IBAN

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field displays the international code assigned to the country where the bank is based.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Country Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter/Displays the national bank code. This number is used to identify the bank within the country's banking industry. This number should be supplied by the bank.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account number.
customrecordcustomfield.label: BBAN

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the Business Identifier Code of the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: BIC

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the Bank Fee Code to identify who shoulders the bank fees for processing the payment. Valid values are: CRED - payee shoulders all fees DEBT - payer shoulders all fees SHAR - payer and payee shoulder bank fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bank Fee Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field displays the list of subsidiaries assigned to this entity record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field suggests whether the account number(custrecord_2663_entity_acct_no) is encrypted or not.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is Account Number Encrypted
